column2: While it is true that [From.GetFirstName] is not my husband's child, there can be no doubt that [From.GetSheHe] is mine. I am determined that [From.GetSheHe will carry on my dynasty even if [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] will not acknowledge [From.GetHerHim]. After all, by our marriage contract all children are of my dynasty.
Try to convince [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] that he is the father.
I don't care about his opinion.

While it is true that [From.GetFirstName] is not my husband's child, there can be no doubt that [From.GetSheHe] is mine. If [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName can not be persuaded to legitimize [From.GetHerHim], then [From.GetSheHe] will carry on my dynasty.
